Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu today at the Cabinet meeting: This is the 10th day that Israel's cities have been under terrorist attack.
The IDF is operating against Hamas and the other terrorist organizations in the Gaza Strip from the sea and air, and now on land as well.
Last night, our forces commenced a ground operation in order to strike at the terrorist tunnels from the Gaza Strip into Israeli territory.
I remind you that it was through such a tunnel that Hamas terrorists infiltrated into our territory yesterday morning
in order to perpetrate a large scale attack against Israel's citizens. The IDF successfully thwarted this terrorist act.
Because it is not possible to deal with the tunnels only from the air, our soldiers are now doing so on the ground.
Even here there is no guarantee of 100% success, but we are doing our utmost in order to achieve the maximum.
To our sorrow, a soldier has already fallen and I send condolences to his family. I am certain that I speak on behalf of all Israelis.
My instructions to the IDF, w / approval of the Security Cabinet, are to be ready for the possibility of an expansion of the ground operation.
The terrorist state Israel has bombed Gaza for days, and now it has begun its ground operations. In a week more than 240 innocent martyrs were killed.
Last night's operation came after Israel agreed to the Egyptian ceasefire proposal and to the UN initiative for a humanitarian truce.
In both cases, Hamas continued firing. We chose to commence this operation after we had exhausted the other possibilities,>
> And with the understanding that without action, the price that we would pay would be much greater.
The supreme consideration that guides us is to restore the security to Israel's citizens and to restore quiet to the country.

Religious relations in Azerbaijan are based on a strong, solid foundation, and today a special place in the successful development of our country.
These relations are exemplary in Azerbaijan.
Azerbaijan is committed to its national and religious values. We have values ​​that keep us as a nation and a nation for centuries.
Today, our national values, which are globalized, face difficulties, constitute the basis of our statehood.
Independent Azerbaijan is a country that is open to the word of the world and pursues an independent policy and the domestic policy is complemented by foreign policy.
A very valuable, educated and educated young generation grows in Azerbaijan. That young generation that will govern our country in the future.
Today, our youth is proud to say that they are Azerbaijani citizens.
Because the successful development process in our country fills the heart of every patriot.
Representatives of all peoples and religions in Azerbaijan live as one family. For centuries it has been so.
Today, these positive trends are intensifying during the years of independence.
In the Azerbaijani society, representatives of all peoples and religions have equal rights.
Today, it is impossible to imagine the policy of Azerbaijan without the region.
Because we take our steps, initiatives, political, economic, and other steps (cont) http://t.co/0TJp6RSf1k
At the heart of our policy is the citizen of Azerbaijan, its problems, security, concerns and welfare.
Therefore, the people-power union is a key condition for stability in Azerbaijan.
There has never been a conflict on the national, religious, sectarian basis in Azerbaijan and will not be.
The guarantor of this is the Azerbaijani state, the people of Azerbaijan.
Azerbaijani citizens live and live in security conditions. Azerbaijan is one of the safest countries in the world.
These key conditions allow us to plan our future and look at the future with great optimism.
Today, inter-religious, international friendship and brotherhood tendencies are intensifying in Azerbaijan.
It is no coincidence that international forums on multiculturalism and interfaith dialogue are held in Azerbaijan.
Our native Homeland, which develops in this direction, will have even greater positions in the future.
Our mission is to develop our country and our main goal is to restore our territorial integrity.
To achieve this, we must be stronger.
